name: Get the HELL Outta Here!
description:
You are in Hell. You must escape. Hell is infinite. That's a bit of a quandary, isn't it?

Get the HELL Outta Here! is a turn-based roguelike where you must fight through endless waves of demons. Your goal? Kill as many as possible and earn the right to sit at the top spot of the global leader board.

Features:

  • Randomly generated levels
  • Powerful bosses to defeat, every 5 levels
  • Level up your team as you kill your way through the hordes of Hell. But beware: Your party is only as strong as its weakest member.
  • Purchase Potions to assist you in your battle.
  • Local and Global Leader boards. Challenge your friends, or the world!
